data.title: Home St. John the Baptist Parish
data.meta_description: St. John the Baptist Parish The new St. John the Baptist Parish website is a one stop source of information and user friendly features.
data.text:
Elevated Water Tower and Storage Tank Rehabilitation Project

Published on July 18, 2024

Parish President Hotard is pleased to share that a $3 million Elevated Water Tower and Storage Tank Rehabilitation project is near completion.

Parish President Hotard congratulates Department of Community Services

Published on July 11, 2024

Parish President Jaclyn Hotard congratulates the St. John Parish Department of Community Services, who was only one of five agencies in the state, to have zero warnings or errors on their 2023 Community Services Block Grant Annual Report.

"This is a testament to the hard work of Director Kali Price and the entire Department," said Parish President Hotard. #StJohnStrong

Drainage Work from Parish Line to Parish Line

Published on July 11, 2024

More than 100 pipes and drainage outlets are being cleared and cleaned from Parish line to Parish line.

49th Annual Andouille Festival

Parish President Hotard is pleased to announce the 49th Annual Andouille Festival presented by Marathon Petroleum Company, LP will be held Friday, October 18 through Sunday, October 20 2024 on the grounds of the Thomas F. Daley Memorial (Hwy 51) Park and feature live music, kidâ€™s activities, rides, and delicious food.
